#!/usr/bin/env ruby require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/plist" require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/exit_codes" file = File.expand_path('~/Library/Preferences/com.macromates.textmate.latex_config.plist') if !FileTest.exist?(file) then file = ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT'] + "/latex_config.plist" end
File.open(file) do |f| @plist = PropertyList::load(f) end shortcutHash = @plist['symbols'] currentWord = STDIN.read if (shortcutHash.has_key?(currentWord)) then print shortcutHash[currentWord] else TextMate.exit_discard end
LaTeX Symbol Based on Current Word
